1.name: Dreamweave
1.desc: Upon entering the battlefield, Evelyn immediately gains 1,500 Decibels. Enemies affected by <ct color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</ct> will be <ct color=#FFFFFF>Bound</ct>. When Evelyn attacks <ct color=#FFFFFF>Bound</ct> enemies, she ignores 12% of their DEF. When Evelyn uses <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Binding Sunder - First Form</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Binding Sunder - Final Form</ct>, the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Bound</ct> effect spreads to all enemies hit by the skill. This spread <ct color=#FFFFFF>Bound</ct> effect lasts for 10s.

flavor.0: The distant, blurred light seemed to be a dream she had crafted, an unreachable future. It wasn't about atonement, but a yearning for freedom.
flavor.1: "You want it too, don't you? A real life." An anonymous former coworker once asked Evelyn.

2.name: Dance of Fire
2.desc: Evelyn's ATK increases by 15%. When Evelyn uses <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Garrote - First Form</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Garrote - Second Form</ct>, the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Burning Embers</ct> consumed will be returned. This effect can trigger once every 25s. When Evelyn consumes <ct color=#FFFFFF>Burning Tether Point</ct> to trigger <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack: Lunalux - Snare</ct>, the skill's Interrupt Level increases.

flavor.0: "To me, that light was unfamiliar, something I should have steered clear of, but it broke through every barrier, as though it was trying to remind me that beyond the darkness, there was something worth chasing."
flavor.1: When Evelyn recalls the first time she met Astra Yao, there's a rare softness in her tone.

3.name: Metamorphosis
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2
3.flavor: At that moment, she frees herself from her restraints and becomes her truest self. The tightened ropes snap, and the chains turn into a broken cocoon. Evelyn stands at the boundary of rebirth, and in her cold, sharp gaze, there is the flicker of a faint, soft glow.

4.name: Fate's Melody
4.desc: Upon activating a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>, Evelyn immediately gains a shield equal to 10% of her Max HP. While this shield exists, Evelyn's CRIT DMG increases by 40%.

flavor.0: "You know, Eve? Every time I meet someone important to me, my heart goes 'thump-thump!'"
flavor.1: Evelyn sighs, signaling that it was getting late. Astra quickly fastens the back of her gown and rushed out the door.
flavor.2: "Thump thump," Evelyn mutters to herself, left alone in the dressing room.

5.name: Crimson Threads Like the Dawn
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: Her threads, dyed crimson like the clouds at dawn.
flavor.1: After each attack, she spins elegantly, blazing flames scattering like the morning light. No words are needed — Evelyn's protection has turned into a radiant flame.

6.name: Bond of Light and Shadow
6.desc: Upon launching a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>, Evelyn gains <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shadowstring Edge</ct> for 20s. During <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shadowstring Edge</ct>, when Evelyn hits her primary target with a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, she additionally executes a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</ct> follow-up attack, dealing <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct> equal to 375% of her ATK to enemies in the area. This DMG is considered <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> DMG and can trigger up to 16 times. Gaining another <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shadowstring Edge</ct> will refresh the trigger count.

flavor.0: Where there is light, there will always be shadow.
flavor.1: It silently hides, tracing the light's path, guarding each bright burst. The shadow never tries to steal the light's brilliance, but at every turn, it quietly fills those corners the light cannot reach. The two have never been separated, nor can they be — light is whole because of shadow, and shadow exists because of light. It's an eternal pursuit, an unspeakable connection.
